page.title: 11Cherry Hinton
page.content: The village of Cherry Hinton is situated about two and a half miles south of Cambridge.There was a settlement in this area as long ago as the Iron Age. Cherry Hinton is mainly a residential area but in recent years light industrial development has taken place and provides employment for some of the residents.Other people from the village work in the city or commute to London. There has been much building of houses of all types,both council and private and according to the 1981 Census 7064 people live in Cherry Hinton.There are good amenities such as shops,a Library and Primary Schools.Most children go to the Netherhall School at the age of 11. Cherry Hinton has good bus services linking the village with the city.
